q: returns from visit with Gabrielle Giffords Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.) returned Monday from Houston, where she visited with Rep. Gabrielle Giffords ( D-Ariz.), who is recovering from a gunshot wound to the head. Returned fr Houston today. Gabrielle Giffords continues to defy the odds& is so appreciative of all your support. Pls cont to keep her in your prayers, Kirsten Gillibrand posted on her Twitter account. Gabrielle Giffords was shot in the head at close range during a public event in Tucson, Ariz., on Jan. 8. Simon Cowell "I wanted to do a show where judges could help competitors on a weekly basis," Simon Cowell said, comparing the job to his days as an A&R rep at a record label. It's more interesting to me; it definitely gives me something more to do. When an artist wins, you win. It really does become an incredible competition with judges, in a way more than the artists, because we don't pretend to like each other. Simon Cowell said a decision about who will sit beside him on the panel will be made in the next three or four weeks. He says he's looking for people who could one-up him in battle.
